channel.title: Making jail safe zone
channel.description: need a code or tut on how to make the jail for massers a safe area if u know how to plz contact me it is kazard fite pits

item.title: Making jail safe zone
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

First you would need to walk down there and get the coords.

For instance :
______
Here’s the jail - | | You would get the coords of the four corners.
| |
| |
|_____|

Once you’ve done that… Find this : public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Then replace that with this : public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) || (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Except change the coords on there to the ones you have from the jail.

Read full topic
